author: smuzaffar
body:
#### PR description:

Please do not merge. This PR is to tests clang-tidy check `readability-braces-around-statements`. This should be tested along with https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/21478 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/4914
title: [Do not Merge] Apply readability-braces-around-statements clang-tidy check for Alignment
